title: the implications of industry 4.0 for managing supply chain disruption and enhancing supply chain resilience: a systematic literature review
definition: supply chain antifragility has emerged as a way of not only managing disruptions but also leveraging them as opportunities for growth.

title: the implications of industry 4.0 for managing supply chain disruption and enhancing supply chain resilience: a systematic literature review
definition: antifragile supply chains not only withstand volatility and shocks but also thrive and improve from such disturbances.

title: the effect of digital governance to stimulate the antifragile capabilities of public sector organizations
definition: taleb... suggested establishing a robust yet transformative and emergent environment, which equips the system with the knowledge and capacity to deal with and capitalize on uncertainty.

title: the effect of digital governance to stimulate the antifragile capabilities of public sector organizations
definition: antifragile organizations are better prepared to respond to crises and emerge more robust... transforming [risks] into opportunities.

title: health service implementation and antifragile characteristics in rural communities: a dirt research approach
definition: when programs or units are antifragile, they stand to gain from inevitable volatility rather than be harmed by it.

title: antifragile philosophy in r&d projects: applying q methodology and the possibility of open innovation
definition: the concept of antifragile was created by nicholas nasim taleb in 2012. it is a neologism that taleb uses to define the opposite to fragile... the opposite is what not only does not deteriorate, break down and/or collapse but also improves.

title: empowering organisations to gain from uncertainty: a conceptualisation of antifragility through leveraging organisational routines in uncertain environments
definition: the concept of gaining from uncertainty referred to as antifragility.

title: a philosophy of security architecture design
definition: there may exist vulnerabilities and there may be exposure, but steps will be taken to mitigate weaknesses. upon experiencing adversities, a host of measures will be taken to strengthen the system. one will learn from the incident, and improve on the system in as many ways as are practical.
